title: Chroma Zyra
body: I think  we need a Chroma Zyra where she has a different Flower based colors to her will work out real well, she seems based around Red rose, so why not Chroma her out based on things like Daisy (white and yellow) Violet  (Purple and yellow)  and Clematis (red and purple). If not make them skins for her.

replies.body:
This sounds like an awesome chroma!

but it looks like RIOT gave up on chroma's ages ago, its been half a year since we have heard anything about them and one of them didn't even come out.

although it is true we haven't seen one in a while, that does not mean they wont pick it back up again, they are focused on season 6 and then new champion Jhin, and talks of rewards so maybe chroma packs are going to be moved over to awards? if not they can make them skins, would be nice for like Earth Day
